name: kinetic-resource-planning-simulator
description: Kinetic Resource Planning Simulator in TypeScript

scripts.rebuild: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:simple: npm run build && npm run krpsim -- resources/simple 1000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/ikea 1000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/steak 1000
scripts.test:hard: npm run build && npm run krpsim -- resources/recre 5000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/inception 5000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/pomme 5000
scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm run krpsim -- resources/simple 1000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/ikea 1000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/steak 1000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/recre 5000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/inception 5000 && npm run krpsim -- resources/pomme 5000
